name: The Artist (itch) (Tomga)
description:
Play your cards wisely and defeat The Artist. But be careful, as he likes to paint on your cards!

Made for the Ludum Dare 51 game jam. My first game jam game! Although I didn't have that much time to make it, I am happy with the result.

I suggest downloading the game, as the web version is missing some assets. If you do play the web version, make sure to fullscreen it!
